trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Scranton
There were no other sightings in Scranton on or around June 29th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was over near scranton high school at a restaurant sitting outside. when all of a sudden this bright white light appeared over the east mountain area i assume. you could see the towers on the mountain as well. this light was def brighter than the towers too. you could see it on top of the mountain. my boyfriend and i watched it for about 4 min then it just disappeared. just like that. scary feeling. nothing like we've seen before.
Summary: Bright white light over the east mountain area
